comments.author: THE AGENT

comments.text:
As a person who is studying chemistry, I am so moved by this video.
The sodium bicarbonate will definetly react with any menthol. The sugars on 
that soda is positively sucrose and fructose which helps us gain energy but 
too much can cause weight problems. Of course it also has mannose and other 
sugars on it. It has no health benefits. We can only gain energy from it. 
It's acidity is high enough to deteriorate protein molecules present in 
milk, what more if it is inside the body. Maybe the best solution is we 
stop drinking this stuff, but if we cant stop maybe we can at least 
minimize the consumption.

I love this video, very informative and full of facts. Keep it Buzz Feed

- i dont have any resentment in coke. Just informing. ^_^﻿
